quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), the Department of Youth Affairs has hosted Y20 Summit under G20 at Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh. Youth20 is one of the official Engagement Groups of the G20. It provides a platform for youth to express their perspectives and ideas on G20 priorities. Which of the following is not among the five themes of Y20-2023?a) Climate Change and Disaster Risk Reduction: Making Sustainability a Way of Lifeb) Shared Future: Youth in Democracy and GovernanceC) Building Capacities, promoting Life-long Learning in the context of Future of Work
options: only A
only B
only C
both A and B
both B and C

quiz.text: Identify the correct statement (s) with respect to Mission Amrit Sarovara) Ministry of Panchayat Raj is the Nodal Ministry for the Missionb) The Mission was launched with 7 Central Ministries/ Departmentsc) BISAN-G is the technical partner of the Mission.
options: only a
only b
only c
both a and b
both b and c

quiz.text: Identify the incorrect statement (s) with respect to Mission Amrit Sarovar.a) The District level target of the mission is to construct/rejuvenate a minimum of 100 Amrit Sarovarsb) The National level target of the mission is to build 50 thousand Amrit Sarovars by August 15, 2023.c) Every Amrit Sarovar will have an approx. area of 1 acre with a water holding capacity of about 7,500 cubic metre
options: only a
only b
only c
both a and b
both a and c

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), the Ministry of Panchayat Raj, Government of India, in close collaboration with Panchayati Raj & Rural Development Department, Government of Jammu & Kashmir has organized a workshop on Theme 8 of Localization of Sustainable Development Goals (LSDGs). Which of the following is the Theme 8 of LSDGs?
options: Healthy Village
Village with Good Governance
Child Friendly Village
Clean and Green Village
Women Friendly Village

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), GeM has crossed Rs  1 lakh crore in Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) within how many days in FY 2023-24?
options: 120 days
150 days
250 days
243 days
145 days

quiz.text: The average GMV per day has increased to Rs  690 crore per day in FY 2023-24 from ____ in FY 2022-23
options: Rs 500 crore
Rs 550 crore
Rs 412 crore
Rs 450 crore
Rs 480 crore

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), IITM Pravartak Technologies Foundation at IIT Madras has developed an indigenous security testing solution for 5G core network functions and Radio Access Network (RAN) software under National Mission on Interdisciplinary Cyber Physical Systems (NM-ICPS). Identify the correct statement(s) with respect to NM-ICPS.a) NM-ICPS is implemented by Department of Biotechnologyb) The outlay of the mission is Rs 3,800 crorec) 25 Technology Innovation Hubs have been established in reputed institutions across India in advanced technologies
options: only a
only b
only c
both a and b
both a and c

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), G20 Pandemic Fund has approved the USD 25 million towards “Animal Health Security Strengthening in India for Pandemic Preparedness and Response”. Who among the following is the trustee of the G20 Pandemic Fund?
options: Asian Development Bank
World Bank
World Health Organization
United Nations
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), 15th BRICS Summit was held at Johannesburg, South Africa. Identify the incorrect statement(s) regarding BRICS.a) Russia was the last country to join BRICSb) Six new countries would be joining BRICS as full-time members from January 1, 2024.C) BRICS countries represent over 25% of global trade
options: only a
only b
only c
both a and b
both a and c

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), 20th Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN)-India Economic Ministers’ meeting  was held at Semarang, Indonesia. During the meeting it was agreed to complete the review of ASEAN-India Trade in Goods Agreement (AITIGA) by which of the following years?
options: 2025
2024
2026
2030
2028

quiz.text: Identify ‘X’ using the following statementsa) ‘X’ was established by signing Bangkok Declarationb) ‘X’ would be chaired by Laos in 2024c) The friendship year between India & X was observed in 2022
options: SAARC
BIMSTEC
ASEAN
IORA
APEC

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), which of the following organizations have launched National Carbon Registry, an open-source software which allows countries to effectively manage national data and processes for trading carbon credits.
options: United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP)
Green Climate Fund
Greenpeace
United Nations Development Program (UNDP)
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), which of the following airports became the first to get Digi Yatra facility in North East India?
options: Shillong Airport
Pakyong Airport
Bir Tikendrajit International Airport
Donyi Polo Airport
Lokpriya Gopinath Bordoloi International Airport

quiz.text: The World Health Organization (WHO) and the G20 India presidency recently (August 2023) launched the Global Initiative on Digital Health (GIDH) during G20 Health Ministers’ meeting held in________. It will support the implementation of the Global Strategy on Digital Health ______.
options: Delhi, 2020-2030
Mumbai, 2020-2025
Jaipur, 2025-2030
Gandhinagar, 2020-2025
None of the above

quiz.text: Which city recently (August 2023) served as the venue for the 4th G20 Digital Economy Working Group (DEWG) Meeting?
options: Lucknow
Gandhinagar
Hyderabad
Pune
Bengaluru

quiz.text: Which city recently (August 2023) served as the venue for the G20 Digital Innovation Alliance (DIA) Summit?
options: Lucknow
Gandhinagar
Hyderabad
Pune
Bengaluru

quiz.text: Which of the following is correctly associated with the recently (August 2023) held Health Ministers’ meeting in the Gandhinagar? A) 1st WHO Traditional Medicine Global Summit was organized alongside this meeting. B) India MedTech Expo 2023 was hosted by the Department of Pharmaceuticals to harness the potential of the Medical Devices sector towards making India the global hub of MedTech. C) The Advantage Health Care India - One Stop Digital Portal for Patient and Workforce Mobility Portal were launched at India MedTech Expo 2023. D) WHO’s flagship report on “Digital in Health-Unlocking Value for Everyone” released during the meeting.
options: A and C only
A, B and C only
B and C only
A and B only
All of the above

quiz.text: The Global Maritime India Summit (GMIS) It is a premier maritime sector focused event to bring together pivotal figures from the industry to explore opportunities, understand challenges, and stimulate investment within India's maritime sector. Upcoming _______ instalment slated for 17th to 19th October 2023, at ________.
options: 3rd, Chennai
2nd, Kochi
4th, Mumbai
2nd, New Delhi
3rd, New Delhi

quiz.text: In recent (August 2023) news, a significant 'Implementation Arrangement' signing ceremony took place in New Delhi, signifying the collaboration between which of the following two entities?
options: United States' National Institute of Health (NIH) and India's Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
India's Ministry of Science and Technology and China's State Administration for Science, Technology, and Industry for National Defense (SASTIND)
India's Department of Biotechnology (DBT) and Germany's Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF)
United States' National Science Foundation (US-NSF) and India's Department of Biotechnology (DBT)
Australia's Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation (CSIRO) and India's Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR)

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023) Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) announced its 1st Joint Call for proposals under the May 2023 Implementation Arrangement (IA). Which of the following statement with respect toit is correct?A) The collaborative initiative, Implementation Arrangement (IA) aims only at theoretical research and does not involve technology development.B) Proposal submission for the 1st Joint Call will begin on August 21, 2023, with the final submission deadline set for January 5, 2024.C) The first Joint Call targets proposals in semiconductor research, communication technologies, cybersecurity, sustainability, green technologies and Intelligent Transportation Systems.
options: A and B only
A and C only
B and C only
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text: As pointed out in the SBI Research report “Deciphering emerging Trends in ITR Filing: The Ascent of the new Middle Class”, the weighted mean income in India has increased from Rs. 4.4 lakh in 2014 to_______ in 2023.
options: Rs. 10 lakh
Rs. 12 lakh
Rs. 13 lakh
Rs. 14 lakh
Rs. 13.5 lakh

quiz.text: Which of the following statement about the recently (August 2023) approved Mutual Recognition Arrangement (MRA) by the Indian Cabinet is/are correct?A) The MRA was signed between the Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) of India and the Department of Home Affairs incorporating the Australian Border Force of Australia. B) The main objective of the MRA is to provide exchange of information that is "foreseeably relevant" to the administration and enforcement of domestic tax laws on the Contracting Parties.C) The MRA between India and United States aims to provide reciprocal benefits to exporters in the clearance of goods by the Customs authorities of the exporting country.D) The MRA initiative is an independent effort and is not related to the World Customs Organization's SAFE Framework of Standards.
options: A only
B only
C only
D only
None of the above

quiz.text: Investor Education and Protection Fund Authority (IEPFA) and National Council of Applied Economic Research (NCAER) recently (August 2023) conducted a significant webinar under theme 'Investor Protection Framework in India: Challenges and Road Ahead'. Identify the incorrect statement with respect these organizations.
options: The IEPFA was set up in 2016 and it works under the aegis of the Ministry of Finance, Government of India.
The IEPFA works for administering the Investor Education and Protection Fund for making refunds of shares, unclaimed dividends, and matured deposits/debentures, among other things, to investors.
NCAER is India’s oldest and largest independent economic think tank, set up in 1956.
NCAER was started as a public-private partnership, it is funded by the government and private industry and informs policy choices for both the public and private sectors.
None of the above

quiz.text: President Droupadi Murmu recently gave assent to four bills passed during the monsoon session of the parliament. Which of the following statements regarding the Registration of Births and Deaths (Amendment) Bill, 2023, which has been now signed into law is correct?A) The primary purpose of the bill is to replace the existing Registration of Births and Deaths Act, 1969. B) The bill introduces digital birth certificates, which simplify the process of verifying birth details by eliminating the need for multiple documents.C) The bill proposes the integration of Aadhaar details of parents and informants with birth certificates, extending to various reporting authorities. D) The centralized database created by the bill will exclusively manage birth and death records without any additional usage. E) The centralized database will also provide updates to the National Population Register, ration cards, and property registrations.
options: A, B, C and D only
A, B, C and E only
A, B, C only
A, B, D only
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements accurately describe the Stockholm Water Week (World Water Week) seen in the news recently (August 2023)?A) The event was organized by the Stockholm International Water Institute (SIWI) and focuses on exploring innovative solutions for water-related challenges.B) The theme for the 2023 World Water Week was "Seeds of Change: Innovative Solutions for a Water-Wise World."C) World Water Week is held the first week of August every year and was initially part of a public water festival in the Swedish capital, Stockholm.D) The Stockholm Water Prize and the Stockholm Junior Water Prize presented during the event.
options: A and B only
B and C only
C and D only
A, B and C only
A, B and D only

quiz.text: Which of the following statements inaccurately describe the recently (August 2023) released National Curriculum Framework for School Education (NCS-SE) as per the National Education Policy, 2020?
options: The NCF for School Education covers all four stages of schooling: Foundational Stage, Preparatory Stage, Middle Stage, and Secondary Stage.
The curriculum recommends that students achieve linguistic proficiency in academic use for at least two Indian languages native to the student by age 15 (class 10).
The NCF aims to eliminate any separation between academic and vocational subjects in the secondary stage and offers flexibility and choice in subject combinations.
The curriculum emphasizes engagement in three different forms of work: work with life forms, work with materials and machines, and work in human services.
Under the stewardship of Prof. C. Rangarajan, a National Curriculum Framework Oversight Committee was formed to create NCF-SE.
